summary: The transportation sector is the largest source of greenhouse gas emissions in the U.S. State and local agencies play a key role in helping to reduce greenhouse gas emissions from vehicles—such as by investing in electric vehicle infrastructure that could reduce emissions. However, some of these agencies face challenges, including: Lacking readily available emissions data or staff with the right subject matter expertise Trouble quantifying...
title: Climate Change: State and Local Efforts to Reduce Greenhouse Gas Emissions from Vehicles
